author: Ryan Heath
title: A global guide to combating the coronavirus
description: From Germany to Iceland to Africa there are many paths to success in the fight to contain the virus causing Covid-19.
content:
Heres a guide to whos doing best and why.
Germany All around excellence
Based on known infections, Germany has one of the lowest death rates world-wide. Contributing factors include wider testing, but Europes most populous country also has the most restrict… [+8580 chars]
